item.title: Sharepoint full page little trick
item.description: For those of you with a very specific task to create a hotsite in sharepoint(MOSS) and can’t (or dont want to) create a new template just for that, here it goes: https://gist.github.com/tiagodll/6990155 with this simple snippet your div is the new body of your page so go ahead and put the whole html code you need in there. Loading ….
